testcase.classname: US1001 Kullanici JPH get request sonuclarini test eder
testcase.name: TC01 yapilan GET request sonucunda response degerleri beklenen degerlere esit olmali
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "jPHBaseUrl" base URL'ini kullanir..........................passed Then Path parametreleri icin "posts/44" kullanir............................passed And jPH server a GET request gonderir ve testleri yapmak icin response degerini kaydeder.passed Then jPH response'da status degerinin 200...................................passed And jPH response'da content type degerinin "application/json; charset=utf-8".passed And jPH responseBody'sindeki attributeleri test etmek icin response i JsonPath objesine cast eder.passed Then jPH GET response body'sinde "userId" degerinin Integer 5...............passed And jPH GET response body'sinde "title" degerinin String "optio dolor molestias sit".passed
